name: Shifty
description:
Play as a shifty Blobfish with legs, shifting crates!

Play as Blobfish (P1): Arrow keys to move. Line up 7 crates in a row to clear them and shave 5 seconds off the timer!

Play as Dropper (P2): A and D to move left and right, and S to drop deadly crates on Blobfish!

Have fun!
